title: Meet Kagent, Open Source Framework for AI Agents in Kubernetes
author: Heather Joslyn
description: Solo.io introduces a new project designed to help users build and run AI agents to speed up Kubernetes workflows.
cntitle: 认识 Kagent，Kubernetes 中 AI Agent 的开源框架
cndescription: Solo.io 推出一个新项目，旨在帮助用户构建和运行 AI 代理，以加速 Kubernetes 工作流程。
